original: Noupādānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: no upādānam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no upādānaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Upādānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: upādānam akusalam dhammam paṭicca no upādānaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nokilesaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam kusalam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate tīṇi
